pr_title: [BEAM-9577] Artifact v2 support for uber jars.

timeline.message: [BEAM-9577] Artifact v2 support for uber jars.
lint, attempt to use system class loader to make jenkins happy

timeline.author: ibzib

timeline.bodyText: Nice! But I don't see this actually used anywhere?
timeline.author: ibzib

replies.bodyText: It's used on the Python side.
replies.author: robertwb

replies.bodyText: That's what I get for only reading half the PR...
replies.author: ibzib

timeline.bodyText: How did I never know this? 😆
timeline.author: ibzib

timeline.bodyText: Can we add a couple trivial unit tests as sanity checks / documentation for resolve and getCurrentDirectory?
timeline.author: ibzib

replies.bodyText: The documentation is in the super classes, but I added a test.
replies.author: robertwb

timeline.bodyText: Should we change PortablePipelineJarUtils to use ClassLoaderFileSystem? (Maybe in a follow-up PR) https://github.com/apache/beam/blob/master/runners/java-job-service/src/main/java/org/apache/beam/runners/jobsubmission/PortablePipelineJarUtils.java
timeline.author: ibzib

replies.bodyText: Yes, we'll want to do that too (and use the new artifact api).
replies.author: robertwb
